title: Darius W bug
body:
So I play a lot of Darius, noticed that when you use his w, somtimes but way too regularly, minions and champions will flicker between targetable and untargetable and it makes you run around like a lost skuttle. I haven't had any experience reporting bugs, help a brother out? 

Also if you've noticed this but aren't entirely sure enough to report it, I've noticed it happening across my last 50ish darius games. 

I've also heard this only occurs with the dunkmaster skin, I haven't used any other skins in the last few months so I will try this also. 

Happy Dunking.
